DOC.brief_summary: This non-randomized , open-label , dose-escalating Phase Ia study perform single center design evaluate safety , pharmacokinetics , preliminary efficacy intravitreous administration RNA-144101 patient geographic atrophy ( GA ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase I Open Label Dose Escalation Trial RNA-144101 Treatment Geographic Atrophy
